author: Jordyn Tilchen
title: Taylor Swift Postpones Lover Fest And Reminds Fans To Stay Home
description: Today (April 17), Taylor Swift took to her Instagram Stories to announce that Lover Fest is officially postponed due to the ongoing coronavirus pandemic. Tour dates will be rescheduled to 2021.
content: Over the last several weeks, artists have been canceling and postponing their tours as a result of the ongoing coronavirus pandemic. And while this probably doesn't come as much of a shock, Taylor Swift is the latest musician to follow suit. In a post shared … [+2280 chars]
